author: Al Jazeera Staff
title: US will sanction Putin for invading Ukraine, White House says
description: Biden administration to impose sanctions on Russian president, foreign minister and members of national security team.
content:
Washington, DC The United States will impose sanctions on Russian President Vladimir Putin over his decision to invade Ukraine, the White House has said.
